properties.name: Cardinal Elementary School | 1745 Catalina Dr
properties.description: RPS will be providing food to RPS families on January 9-10 at six school sites around the city. Thursday volunteers are needed to hand out food to families as they walk up or drive through. Friday volunteers will be needed to help with families that come to the food trucks at the school sites. We will need volunteers from 10:30 am - 1:00 pm both days. Sign-up here:¬†https://www.signupgenius.com/go/409084BA9AB2FA6FD0-54296318-rpslunch#/
